storyInfo: LeaderEntering Central Londinium, Siege meets the leader of the Self-Salvation Corps noble faction, Allerdale Cumberland. And with the Doctor's support, Amiya resolves to seek the truth of Theresa's resurrection.

attributes.content: Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Regretfully... I was late.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Does... does Your Majesty share the same regrets I do? That we were not able to stop them here?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Manfred...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Back then... in Kazdel, you would never speak to me so guardedly.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Back then, you'd look me straight in the eye.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Your Majesty, Kazdel was nothing more than a cluttered ruin and a thick stack of blueprints. In all those years, you and the general...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: No, as things are now, there is no need to speak of past matters.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Your Majesty has returned to the general's side. Together, you shall rule the Royal Court and bring the Sarkaz victory once again, just as countless times in the past.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: For me and the rest of the men, we need only remember this.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Even so, Manfred... I really wish to meet the girl.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Your Majesty!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Do you think a person dreams, in death?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I've dreamt of them often, the past few months.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Again and again I dream of that ship. I dream of conversations with that doctor of few smiles. I dream of standing shoulder to shoulder with that silent commander on the ship's deck. I dream of...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: ...I dream of sitting by her bedside every night, telling tales of the Sarkaz and this great land, lulling the girl to sleep.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Is... the general aware?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: He knows all.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: However, a dream is but a dream...Isn't that so?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Your Majesty, your cheeks...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Ah... It's just ash.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I thought...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I do not shed tears.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Yes... Why do I not shed tears?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Your Majesty, in the end you still allowed 'her' to go to the city walls?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You are aware of the threat the 'King of Sarkaz' bears.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Of course. Not even Manfred or the Sanguinarch may be capable of successfully capturing the successor to that power.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: ——To defeat a 'Sarkaz King', the safest choice is naturally another one.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Did you not intend that when you raised that suggestion to me?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I also remember that you nearly killed me when I first suggested to bring 'her' back.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: 'Vomit inducing'—— That's what you said. It's difficult to forget such fury.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: My opinion has not changed.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: But we still need 'her', do we not?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Only when the two of you stand together, will the soldiers truly believe that the chaotic and dark era of the past is now history.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: They will never again question the legitimacy of your orders. There will no longer be two different voices in the Sarkaz's hearts.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: To this end, we must get hold of the other 'Sarkaz King' as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Then go and make sure of that.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The soldiers must focus on the war ahead.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: They must clearly understand that they are following a ruler who can lead them out of their plight, and not just some power of dubious ownership.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I know, I know. You have never cared for that black crown.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: For your satisfaction, I have never stopped researching the 'Sarkaz King' either.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Thanks to 'her', I've made great progress. Should we get our hands on that Cautus too... Perhaps, we will be able to truly understand the power of the 'Sarkaz King' before too long.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are not slaves to any man or power.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: If the crown of the 'Sarkaz King' is but another shackle...
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Then, crush it.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Your wish aligns with my own... It will be done, Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I did not expect you to return so late, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: ...Keh.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You seem... tired.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Confessarius, you neglected to inform me that the banshee was there too.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Ah... I thought you'd have guessed it.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: A banshee can be more trouble to deal with than a nachzehrer. What frightening talent.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: That said, next time I'll simply stick his tongue in a crystal case and gift it to his mother.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The Regent and the Nachzehrer King will not be pleased, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Then they'd best not find out.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Also, that Manfred... How dare he use those toys mounted on the city walls on me?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Half the filth on me is thanks to him. Perhaps I should teach him a lesson.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I understand your frustrations, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Consider this, as a tiny compensation for the missing intel, I will suggest the Regent grant you the task of capturing the 'Sarkaz King'.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Heh, that bastard failed after all. I've been telling Theresis all this time he's just a soft-hearted coward.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: It's fine, all of this is within the Regent's plans.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Let them celebrate for now. After all, the best way to crush hope is to first let it come to fruition.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Hah... The nobles in the city grow restless once more. You're right, let them continue with their folly.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: When the banquet is at its peak, the abrupt shifting of laughter to horror... it's tantalizing.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Incidentally, speaking of the nobles——
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Is there anything Your Highness wishes to report to the Regent?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: No, nothing.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Tell Theresis... I await the next banquet.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: He's obviously discovered something, but he's hiding it?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: These little moves... I fear the Regent will not tolerate him much longer.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Leader.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Any movement from the Duke's forces outside the city?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: The Nachzehrer King will be returning soon. Once he arrives, send him to meet the Regent immediately.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Also... didn't you mention a Victorian noble sent some Messengers back?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Let us go and meet them.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Sir, there's one more thing.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Is there?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: She... actually chose to return, at such a time.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Do you have a plan, sir?
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Send a message to the Royal Academy of Sciences.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: It's time... for a long awaited family reunion.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Liz... How are you feeling? Are we going too fast? Are you tired?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...I'm fine.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: You have to tell me if you feel any discomfort.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Yes... my chest feels a bit stuffy.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Is it because you're getting closer to home?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No, that isn't my home.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Shining... My home is with you and Nearl.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I didn't want you to come back here.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But I wanted to.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I want to go with you, and... I want to find what I've lost.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I... I can feel that they're here.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Yes, Nightingale. We'll find them, and they'll help you get better. You are going to get better.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: And then... we'll return to Rhodes Island. Or we could also go to Kazimierz... We'll go wherever you want.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You'll... go with me, right?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Of course, Liz.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No matter when, as long as you want it... I will stay by your side.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.text: It feels like going on a brand new journey, while also returning to the starting point.
Its high walls give Londinium the feeling of a giant cage, or even a sealed graveyard. But it is also the past and present home of countless people.
This place hides many answers, yet it also leads to a great deal more questions.
To a reunion... or a separation?

attributes.content: Are we... alive?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Yes, it looks like we can finally take a breather.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: *Sniffles*... Waaah!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock, w-why are you crying? I-I-I've never seen you cry before!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It's nothing, I just... I thought of Bill. When I think of him, I just...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Old Bill... *sigh*.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: *Sniffles*...*cough* N-No. I shouldn't do this.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The battle... isn't over.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: It's fine, Rockrock. We're safe right now. We can take a break, and think of Old Bill and our other friends...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Before the next battle starts. It's what we ought to do.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We meet at last.
You are...?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Allerdale Cumberland. Call me Allerdale.
I'm Clovisia's friend, and the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps' officer-in-charge of Auchterigg borough——that is, Central Londinium.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Cumberland?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're the Duke of Cumberland's...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: ...Daughter.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I was just a small child when Father passed away.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I only remember him brushing his sweat-laden beard on my face whenever he returned from a fencing match——This is the only memory I have left after twenty years.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I heard that the Duke of Cumberland... was betrayed by other anti-royalist dukes.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Father walked the path he believed in, for the sake of his ideals.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I respect him greatly, which is why I'm here.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You and the other nobles within the city... You've been fighting against the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yes, but our efforts have only just begun to bear fruit.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I was extremely surprised when Isabelle came to look for me.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Not just because she's the Count of Manchester's successor——Although the count has always been one of our most steadfast supporters.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It's just that I thought all the Knights of the Tower were dead...Isabelle's return was a great inspiration to many of us.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Of course, what surprised me the most was... you.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You know who I am?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Haha, I was not aware at first. How could I be 'surprised' otherwise?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: All these years, we have never stopped looking for you, but there were never any clues. Many thought that you were long dead...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I never believed so.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I do believe many of those looking for me actually wanted to take my life.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Perhaps so...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But even among those, there are many who've changed their minds.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You've seen what's happened to Londinium——
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: People lost their freedom long ago.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: All Victorians, even those nobles holding tightly onto their titles, must either become a slave to the Sarkaz, or tremble in fear as they hope to survive till the next day.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Even deep in slumber, they instinctively cry out 'Your Majesty'——
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Is there anyone who has not wondered, should that sudden execution all those years ago have gone another way, would Londinium be as it is today?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Do you really think that my presence here would change anything?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: At the very least, it opens up a new possibility.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Even though you appear to be contemplating, I know you have already set your heart on it.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You sent Isabelle to contact me. Is that not a sign that you're prepared to lead us against the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I don't deny that I've made a decision.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But being prepared... you can never be fully prepared.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're not wrong.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We should begin, Lady Cumberland... Allerdale. Please walk me through our current situation again.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm sure you understand that I have a lot to catch up on.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Great, I love your enthusiasm. That's just what we need right now.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Welcome home, Alexandrina... Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Heidi.
Kal'tsit... *Huff*, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: ——It's tough to get a meeting with you.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Did anyone follow you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't worry, I've carefully covered my tracks all the way here.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: How could I be your Messenger if I wasn't even capable of that?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: You've already done very well. Your father would be proud.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Frankly, many times in the past when I was close to failure... I would think of you, and wonder what you would do.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I would also think about what you would say, if I could get everyone to make it through with me...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: But, now that you're really standing before me, I suddenly feel that all those things I've imagined mean nothing.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Heidi, you are well prepared.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: At least... I will always be prepared. All of us will.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: By the way, are you in a hurry to see Amiya?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I've confirmed that she is currently safe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's been a long time since I was in Londinium, so I have a number of matters I need to take care of.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's good.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: There's someone... She's been waiting to meet you.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, start talking. I need an explanation.
——You're alive.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And what exactly do you wish me to explain, W?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You're as calm as ever. Hard for me to tell if you knew before you got here or not.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Whatever, it doesn't even matter if you're a monster or not. I've got bigger fins to fry.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's Theresa... it really was Theresa!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You——How could you let Theresis get his hands on her body?!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ah... Sorry, Doctor. I didn't see you coming.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You've been preoccupied ever since the train.;What did you see on the train?

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I guess there's no hiding it... And I shouldn't hide it from you anyway.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I saw...her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor... Miss Rockrock really was talking about her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Kal'tsit said she already...;Kal'tsit said I...

attributes.content: Four years ago, Theresa passed away.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even though Dr. Kal'tsit and W may disagree with me about the truth behind this... There's one thing we definitely wouldn't get wrong.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That day, we really lost her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I don’t know.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... the moment I saw her at the train station, I finally understood... why I felt those emotions in Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Besides anger... sorrow. An endlessly infinite sorrow.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes... to the Sarkaz, anger and sorrow are symbiotic. It's just that they choose to dry their tears with anger most of the time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And all of those emotions seemed to converge in her eyes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even Theresa had never...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hurting? Maybe, but compared to them... those Sarkaz shattered by hate and prejudice, this is nothing.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can feel it... It's too little, far too little...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I glimpsed it for a moment, but I was nearly drowned under that turbulent wave of emotion.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What did Theresa go through?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is it really not?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, I said before that I really couldn't believe it was her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... when I saw her with my own two eyes, I found it wasn't very difficult at all to accept.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Since I'm here, I need to know the truth.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not just the truth behind Theresa, but also the Sarkaz within the city... What exactly did they experience, that they would be burdened with such anger and sorrow?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: And if the truth brings about more pain?

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You can be afraid, Amiya.;I'm afraid too, Amiya.
But we will walk onwards together.

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, together...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let's look for the answer.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: This is also an answer I need.

attributes.content: I apologize for interrupting you——
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: There's an urgent matter concerning Alexandrina... I mean Vina, as well as our Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Based on a letter from Lady Heidi, we've confirmed that this matter relates to you.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}——
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Is Edward Artorius's relic in your possession?
attributes.name: Allerdale
